name: Highway to Heaven (MTBRGaming)
description:
Highway to Heaven is a 2d endless runner game. You are a ghost trying to make it to heaven on a run-down highway. Dodge cars, dash through cones, collect coins, gain abilities after dying, and beat your high score! Make it to heaven before the darkness catches you! 

Controls:
W/S or Up/Down Arrow to move up and down

D or Right Arrow to Dash

Q, Z, or Left Mouse button to use Ability 1

E, X, or Right Mouse button to use Ability 2
